content:
@Rick Geimer @Wayne Kubick @Grahame Grieve
We have a C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon coming on October 21st, and I am hoping to announce to the community that HL7 has published C-CDA-on-FHIR for FHIR 4.0. What are the chances of this? Is there any obstacle blocking the progress of this IG to get published?
